comment: Sometimes, ya just gotta look away from your screen and check out the outside. My favorite season up here in Seattle. Have a fantastic Sunday!

                              :poss y)
                        :direction (a2 / away))
                  :op2 (c / check-out-05

            :mod (j / just))

      :ARG1 (d / date-entity
